List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

Source: R/crandb-public-api.R, R/print.R
cran_events.Rd

List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

cran_events(releases = TRUE, archivals = TRUE, limit = 10, from = 1)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
summary(object, ...)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
print(x, ...)

Arguments

releases

Whether to include package releases.

archivals

Whether to include package archivals.

limit

Number of events to list.

from

Where to start the list, for pagination.

object

Object to summarize.

...

Additional arguments are ignored currently.

x

Object to print.

Value

List of events.

Examples

cran_events()
#> CRAN events (events)-----------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package   Version Title                                             
#>  + 3 hours streamMOA 1.3-1   Interface for MOA Stream Clustering Algorithms    
#>  + 3 hours ncvreg    3.14.2  Regularization Paths for SCAD and MCP Penalized...
#>  + 6 hours ivreg     0.6-3   Instrumental-Variables Regression by '2SLS', '2...
#>  + 6 hours sketchy   1.0.3   Create Custom Research Compendiums                
#>  - 6 hours BioM2     1.0.5   Biologically Explainable Machine Learning Frame...
#>  + 8 hours tm        0.7-13  Text Mining Package                               
#>  + 9 hours selenider 0.4.0   Concise, Lazy and Reliable Wrapper for 'chromot...
#>  - 9 hours wTO       2.0.2   Computing Weighted Topological Overlaps (wTO) &...
#>  - 9 hours SPOTMisc  1.19.52 Misc Extensions for the 'SPOT' Package            
#>  - 9 hours SPOT      2.11.14 Sequential Parameter Optimization Toolbox         
cran_events(limit = 5, releases = FALSE)
#> CRAN events (archivals)--------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package  Version Title                                              
#>  - 6 hours BioM2    1.0.5   Biologically Explainable Machine Learning Framew...
#>  - 9 hours wTO      2.0.2   Computing Weighted Topological Overlaps (wTO) & ...
#>  - 9 hours SPOTMisc 1.19.52 Misc Extensions for the 'SPOT' Package             
#>  - 9 hours SPOT     2.11.14 Sequential Parameter Optimization Toolbox          
#>  - 9 hours NetSci   1.0.0   Calculates Basic Network Measures Commonly Used ...
cran_events(limit = 5, archivals = FALSE)
#> CRAN events (pkgreleases)------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package   Version Title                                             
#>  + 3 hours streamMOA 1.3-1   Interface for MOA Stream Clustering Algorithms    
#>  + 3 hours ncvreg    3.14.2  Regularization Paths for SCAD and MCP Penalized...
#>  + 6 hours ivreg     0.6-3   Instrumental-Variables Regression by '2SLS', '2...
#>  + 6 hours sketchy   1.0.3   Create Custom Research Compendiums                
#>  + 8 hours tm        0.7-13  Text Mining Package                               
summary(cran_events(limit = 10))
#> CRAN events (events)
#>  [1] "streamMOA@1.3-1"   "ncvreg@3.14.2"     "ivreg@0.6-3"      
#>  [4] "sketchy@1.0.3"     "BioM2@1.0.5-"      "tm@0.7-13"        
#>  [7] "selenider@0.4.0"   "wTO@2.0.2-"        "SPOTMisc@1.19.52-"
#> [10] "SPOT@2.11.14-"
